name: Rectangular Adventure
description:
A platforming project made to test out an idea for a "Hot-seat" cooperative puzzle platform game.

The goal of the game is to get either one of the characters to the end of the stage, utilizing different strengths and overcoming different weaknesses of each character.

Red can jump high, but his height gets in the way over short places.

Blue cant jump high, but being short does get its benefits.

The game can be played with either one or two players, as both playable characters have very simplistic controls.

P.S. The main menu is activated by "Clicking" & not by "Enter due to an error on my part.
